original_text: I also gave them Sabbath days when they would rest. It would help them to remember that they belong to me. They would know that I, the Lord, have made them my holy people.
korean_text: 또 내가 그들을 거룩하게 하는 여호와인 줄 알게 하려고 내 안식일을 주어 그들과 나 사이에 표징을 삼았노라

sentences.original_text: I also gave them Sabbath days
It would help them to remember
sentences.korean_translation: 그것은 그들이 기억하는 데 도움이 될 것이다

sentences.original_text: They would know that I, the Lord
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 내가 주님이라는 것을 알 것이다

sentences.original_text: have made them my holy people
sentences.korean_translation: 그들을 나의 거룩한 백성으로 만들었다는 것을
